mapper.update: update employee set employeename = #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departmentid = #{departmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where employeeid = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select employeeid, employeename, username, phone, email, status, departmentid, password, role from employee where employeeid = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select employeeid, employeename, username, phone, email, status, departmentid, password, role from employee
